cleaned_text: | | Celebration of Har Ghar Tiranga on 77th Independence Day (August 15, 2023) 77th Independence Day celebrated at India House (August 15, 2023) Ambassador interacted with students from Turkmenistan who have secured scholarship by the Indian government (July 28, 2023) Yoga master class held by Embassy for Turkmen youth to mark World Drug Day (July 04, 2023) President of Turkmenistan H.E Mr. Serdar Berdimuhamedov participated in 23rd Meeting of the SCO Council of Heads of State (July 04, 2023) Embassy celebrated 9th International Day of Yoga in Ashgabat(June 21, 2023) ICCR sponsored Bihu/Sattriya dance troupe visited Turkmenistan (June 11-17, 2023) Embassy organised Yoga events at Mary and Turkmenabat as precursor to the International Day of Yoga 2023(June 09-10, 2023) Embassy organised an Indian Cooking Master Class 'Rasoi - The Taste of India' in Ashgabat (June 05, 2023) Embassy organised Tree Plantation and reading of the LiFE pledge as part of promotion of Mission LiFE (June 05, 2023)
